headline: Hyundai to invest $20B in US manufacturing
summary: Korean automaker Hyundai is the latest to announce plans to boost investment in the U.S. to ramp up domestic manufacturing. It is the latest in a growing number of companies to do so.

headline: Lilly, Novo expand DTC reach of obesity meds after compound win
